title: Fun Run
coldOpens: Michael hits Meredith with his car when he is distracted while talking to the documentary crew about living at home with Jan, and how Jim is back and Ryan is boss. He is shocked, while Meredith is injured.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.content: One day, Michael came in complaining about a speed bump on the highway... I wonder who he ran over then.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.content: Guess what, I have flaws. What are they? Oh, I don't know. I sing in the shower. Sometimes I spend too much time volunteering. Occasionally I'll hit somebody with my car. So sue me... No, don't sue me. That is the opposite of the point that I'm trying to make.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.content: They say, if you're nervous around someone, you should picture them naked. I do not recommend this strategy - try picturing them with more clothes on, or a funny coat.
